content.rendered: Reaching all the way from Battersea right down to Brixton, it’s safe to say Clapham’s a pretty big place. So finding the best Clapham taxi service when you’re in this corner of south west London is never going to be as simple as ABC. Addison Lee have been providing London with the city’s safest, most comfortable and most consistently on time private hire cars since 1975. And during that time, we’ve learnt a bit about our customers. We’ve learnt that you don’t like to be let down and that honesty and good communication are just as important as the cleanliness of our cars. That’s why all our drivers are in constant communication with our dispatch office in central London. So they can not only be kept ahead of the traffic and roadworks but also so they can let you know where they are, when they’ll be with you and even if there have been any delays. And unlike some other firms, we’ll never, ever charge you extra if we’re busy. By choosing Addison Lee over expensive black cabs or firms who change their fares on a whim, you’re choosing a better class of Clapham taxi. As with any part of London, Addison Lee are constantly on call in Clapham and the surrounding boroughs, so any time you need us just tap the app, website or – if you’re really old school – give us a call, and we’ll be there in no time. Not sure where to go or what to do while you’re in Clapham? Check out or taxi driver’s guide to the area. We’ve asked all our driver’s where they think the best places to dine, drink and see the sights are and then we sorted them into this handy list. So all you need now is an Addison Lee.
